message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10000?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $11000. It's a great compromise that still reflects the value of the product, but also takes into account your budget concerns.
